text:
>No graphic designers, engineers, or videographers were harmed in the making of these documents. In fact, they weren’t even involved.

hahahaha good one!

I really like it! Is it just a site or can you export it as instagram stories maybe? also, is a mobile app in plan? this would be great on mobile too!

<@UNBPP291C> thanks! :slightly_smiling_face: I could see it working out in a mobile app as well. One of our pillars is definitely portability of the format. Letting people distribute these apps as a link (or eventually bundle of HTML files, images, etc) is really important to us. In fact, we hope to let people effectively build progressive web apps with these documents/apps at some point.
